original: Rūpaṁ rūpāyatanaṁ rūpadhātu nīlaṁ pītakaṁ lohitakaṁ odātaṁ cakkhuviññeyyaṁ cakkhusmiṁ paṭihaññati cakkhussa āpāthaṁ āgacchatīti?
analyzed: ▁rūpaṃ ▁rūpāyatanaṃ ▁rūp adhātu ▁nīl aṃ ▁ pīt akaṃ ▁lohita kaṃ ▁odāt aṃ ▁cakkhu viññeyy aṃ ▁cakkhu smiṃ ▁paṭi haññ ati ▁cakkhu ssa ▁āpāth aṃ ▁āgaccha tīti

original: Hañci “cakkhuñca paṭicca rūpe ca uppajjati cakkhuviññāṇan”ti—
attheva suttanto, no ca vata re vattabbe—
Nanu passati dvinnaṁ rukkhānaṁ antaraṁ, dvinnaṁ thambhānaṁ antaraṁ, tāḷacchiddaṁ vātapānacchiddanti?
analyzed: ▁nanu ▁passati ▁dvinnaṃ ▁rukkh ānaṃ ▁ antar aṃ ▁dvinnaṃ ▁ thambh ānaṃ ▁ antar aṃ ▁tā ḷ a c chidd aṃ ▁vā tap āna c chidd anti

original: Hañci passati dvinnaṁ rukkhānaṁ antaraṁ, dvinnaṁ thambhānaṁ antaraṁ, tāḷacchiddaṁ vātapānacchiddaṁ, tena vata re vattabbe—
analyzed: ▁hañci ▁passati ▁dvinnaṃ ▁rukkh ānaṃ ▁ antar aṃ ▁dvinnaṃ ▁ thambh ānaṃ ▁ antar aṃ ▁tā ḷ a c chidd aṃ ▁vā tap āna c chidd aṃ ▁tena ▁vata ▁ re ▁vattabbe
